github.copilot.viewsWelcome.signIn.message:
Sign in with GitHub to use Copilot, your AI pair programmer.
[Sign In](command:github.copilotChat.signIn)
comment: Do not translate what's inside of the '(..)'. It is an internal command syntax for VS Code

github.copilot.viewsWelcome.individual:
Get started with GitHub Copilot.

[Start 30-day Free Trial](https://github.com/github-copilot/signup?editor=vscode)
github.copilot.viewsWelcome.individual.e:
Your Copilot subscription has expired.

[Review Copilot Settings](https://github.com/settings/copilot?editor=vscode)
github.copilot.viewsWelcome.enterprise: Contact your GitHub organization administrator to enable Copilot.

github.copilot.viewsWelcome.offline.message:
You are currently offline. Please connect to the internet to use Copilot.
[Retry Connection](command:github.copilot.offline)
comment: Do not translate what's inside of the '(..)'. It is an internal command syntax for VS Code

github.copilot.devcontainer.generateDevC: Generate Dev Container Configuration with Copilot
github.copilot.config.localeOverride: Specify a locale that Copilot should respond in, e.g. `en` or `fr`. By default, Copilot will respond using VS Code's configured display language locale.
github.copilot.config.welcomeMessage: Control when to show the detailed welcome chat message.
github.copilot.config.welcomeMessage.alw: Always show the detailed welcome message
github.copilot.config.welcomeMessage.fir: Show the welcome message once per session
github.copilot.config.welcomeMessage.nev: Never show the detailed welcome message
github.copilot.config.terminalChatLocati: Controls where char queries from the terminal should be opened.
github.copilot.config.scopeSelection: Whether to prompt the user to select a specific symbol scope if the user uses `/explain` and the active editor has no selection.
copilot.description: Ask Copilot or type / for commands
copilot.workspace.explain.description: Explain how the code in your active editor works
copilot.workspace.review.description: Review the selected code in your active editor
copilot.workspace.doc.description: Add documentation comment for this symbol
copilot.workspace.tests.description: Generate unit tests for the selected code
copilot.workspace.fix.description: Propose a fix for the problems in the selected code
copilot.workspace.fix.sampleRequest: There is a problem in this code. Rewrite the code to show it with the bug fixed.
copilot.workspace.new.description: Scaffold code for a new workspace
copilot.workspace.new.sampleRequest: Create a RESTful API server using typescript
copilot.workspace.newNotebook.sampleRequ: How do I create a notebook to load data from a csv file?
copilot.workspace.fixTestFailure.descrip: Propose a fix for the failing test
copilot.workspace.semanticSearch.descrip: Find relevant code to your query
copilot.vscode.api.description: Ask about VS Code extension development
copilot.vscode.api.sampleRequest: How do I add text to the status bar?
copilot.vscode.search.description: Generate query parameters for workspace search
copilot.vscode.search.sampleRequest: Search for 'foo' in all files under my 'src' directory
copilot.terminal.description: Ask how to do something in the terminal
github.copilot.submenu.copilot.label: Copilot
github.copilot.config.useProjectTemplate: Use relevant GitHub projects as starter projects when using `/new`
